name: spotify-player
title: Spotify Player
description: Spotify's most common features, now at your fingertips. Search for music and podcasts, browse your library, and control the playback. Glance at what's currently playing directly from the menu bar.
author: mattisssa

preferences.name: closeWindowOnAction
preferences.title: Close window on action
preferences.description: Close the Raycast window after performing an action
preferences.label: Enabled

commands.name: search
commands.title: Search
commands.subtitle: Spotify
commands.description: A single unified search command. Use this to search for artists, albums, songs, playlists, podcasts, and episodes. Use the dropdown menu to filter your search to a specific category. Each category offers contextual actions, so you can dive deeper into the search.

commands.name: yourLibrary
commands.title: Your Library
commands.subtitle: Spotify
commands.description: Use this to see your saved artists, albums, songs, playlists, and podcasts. Similar to the "Search" command, it includes a category dropdown and contextual actions.

commands.name: nowPlaying
commands.title: Now Playing
commands.subtitle: Spotify
commands.description: See what's currently playing. Use the actions (âŒ˜ K) for further actions, such as Play/Pause, Like/Dislike, Skip, Start Radio, Add to Playlist, Connect Device and more.

commands.name: nowPlayingMenuBar
commands.title: Menu Bar Player
commands.subtitle: Spotify
commands.description: See what's currently playing in your Menu Bar. Click for further actions, such as Play/Pause, Like/Dislike, Skip, Start Radio, Add to Playlist, Connect Device and more. Refreshes every 10 seconds.

preferences.name: maxTextLength
preferences.title: Maximum text length
preferences.description: Maximum number of characters to show. If left empty, it defaults to 30

preferences.name: iconType
preferences.title: Icon type
preferences.description: Choose between the default Spotify icon, or the cover image of the current track or episode

preferences.name: hideIconWhenIdle
preferences.title: Hide icon when idle
preferences.description: Hide the icon in the Menu Bar when Spotify is not running or when nothing is playing
preferences.label: Enabled

commands.name: togglePlayPause
commands.title: Toggle Play/Pause
commands.subtitle: Spotify
commands.description: Use this to toggle the playback of the current song.

commands.name: next
commands.title: Next
commands.subtitle: Spotify
commands.description: Use this to skip to the next song/episode.

commands.name: previous
commands.title: Previous
commands.subtitle: Spotify
commands.description: Use this to skip to the previous song/episode.

commands.name: like
commands.title: Like
commands.subtitle: Spotify
commands.description: Use this to like the current song.

commands.name: dislike
commands.title: Dislike
commands.subtitle: Spotify
commands.description: Use this to dislike the current song.

commands.name: volume0
commands.title: Set Volume to 0%
commands.subtitle: Spotify
commands.description: Use this to mute the volume.

commands.name: volume25
commands.title: Set Volume to 25%
commands.subtitle: Spotify
commands.description: Use this to set the volume to 25%.

commands.name: volume50
commands.title: Set Volume to 50%
commands.subtitle: Spotify
commands.description: Use this to set the volume to 50%.

commands.name: volume75
commands.title: Set Volume to 75%
commands.subtitle: Spotify
commands.description: Use this to set the volume to 75%.

commands.name: volume100
commands.title: Set Volume to 100%
commands.subtitle: Spotify
commands.description: Use this to set the volume to 100%.

commands.name: volumeDown
commands.title: Turn Volume Down
commands.subtitle: Spotify
commands.description: Use this to turn the volume down by 10%.

commands.name: volumeUp
commands.title: Turn Volume Up
commands.subtitle: Spotify
commands.description: Use this to turn the volume up by 10%.

commands.name: toggleShuffle
commands.title: Toggle Shuffle
commands.subtitle: Spotify
commands.description: Use this to toggle shuffle.

commands.name: toggleRepeat
commands.title: Toggle Repeat

commands.description: Use this to toggle repeat.

commands.name: startRadio
commands.title: Start Radio
commands.subtitle: Spotify

commands.name: copyUrl

commands.name: justPlay
commands.title: Just Play
commands.subtitle: Spotify
commands.description: Use this to quickly start playing a song based on your query.
